original_title: Несколько вещей, которые напоминают мне о нем
overview: The girl recalls the events associated with her beloved man: when the sound of the long-awaited message covers the roar of the crowd at the rally, a love scene in French cinema is associated with that very meeting, and the simple word "hello" resembles a farewell conversation.
title: Some of the Things That Remind Me of Him
